io.netty.channel.udt

Class UdtMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.buffer.DefaultByteBufHolder
      • io.netty.channel.udt.UdtMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteBufHolder, ReferenceCounted
    Deprecated. 
    The UDT transport is no longer maintained and will be removed.

    @Deprecated
public final class UdtMessage
extends DefaultByteBufHolder
    The message container that is used for TypeUDT.DATAGRAM messages.
    See Also:
    NioUdtProvider.MESSAGE_CONNECTOR, NioUdtProvider.MESSAGE_RENDEZVOUS
